name: World War Zero (itch)
description: Command your navy and defend your home Island against invaders. Build a perfect castle with actual physics based blocks. Defend against the hordes of enemy ship and take control over the enemy Island. Beware of the Gaint Cannon located on enemy fortress that could tear down through your walls and give the enemies an upper hand. The player could also use their kingdom's air force reinforcements to defend against the Gaint Cannon.
